p: This study is to be performed in accordance with the World Medical Association Declaration of Helsinki: Ethical principles for medical research involving human subjects (WMA 20 2013)Â [ 18], the International Ethical Guidelines for Biomedical Research involving Human Subjects (CIOMS 2002) [ 19], and the ICH Harmonised Tripartite Guideline: Guideline for good clinical practice (ICH 1996) [ 20].
